General.Name: GasLog Ltd.
General.Description: GasLog Ltd. provides liquefied natural gas (LNG) shipping services to energy companies. It offers maritime services for the transportation of LNG and LNG vessel management services. The company was incorporated in 2003 and is based in Piraeus, Greece.

9.Name: Mr. Bruno  Larsen
9.Title: Head of Floating, Storage & Regasification Unit Devel.
